short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The only alarm that lets you know when it's 3:11 so you always know what color your energy is!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The alarm clock of your dreams is finally here: it's Amber Alert, the only 311-based notification that tells you when it's exactly 3:11! This innovative new Chrome plug-in plays the opening riff of the classic reggae rock groove "Amber" by 311 every single day at 3:11 AM and PM without fail. Your friends will be impressed when you tell them every day "hey guys, it's 3:11" and you're never wrong. All members of the gender of your choice will want to date you when they see that *you* have Amber Alert installed on your Chrome browser. So what are you waiting for? Install the FREE plug-in today so shades of gold will display naturally wherever you are!
